items.sentence: Tom didn\'t even try to pretend that he liked Mary.
Tom didn\'t have enough money to go to the concert.
The police found Tom\'s fingerprint on the trigger.
The police handcuffed Tom\'s hands behind his back.
I forgot to tell Tom that Mary was in the hospital.
I have a toothache and I want to go to the dentist.
Tom didn\'t know that Mary could understand French.
Do you know where I could buy another one of these?
It just won\'t be the same around here without you.
I\'m sorry, but I don\'t feel like going out today.
